statements: SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE is_paid = FALSE;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date < '2022-10-31';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, due_date FROM OverduePayments WHERE is_paid = TRUE ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, penalty_amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty_amount > 0;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE is_paid = FALSE ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date ASC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM OverduePayments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(payment_amount) > 5000;
SELECT payment_id, due_date, penalty_amount, is_paid FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01' AND is_paid = false;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM OverduePayments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_payment DESC;
SELECT payment_id, penalty_amount + payment_amount AS total_payment FROM OverduePayments WHERE is_paid = true;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_amount, penalty FROM OverduePayments WHERE date_paid IS NULL;

SELECT 
	customer_name,
	customer_email
FROM 
	Customers;

SELECT 
	customer_name,
	customer_email
FROM 
	Customers
ORDER BY 
	registration_date DESC;

SELECT 
	customer_name,
	payment_amount,
	due_date
FROM 
	OverduePayments
WHERE 
	date_paid IS NULL;

SELECT 
	customer_name,
	customer_email,
	payment_amount,
	due_date
FROM 
	Customers 
	INNER JOIN 
	OverduePayments 
	ON Customers.customer_id = OverduePayments.customer_id;

SELECT 
	customer_name,
	customer_email,
	payment_amount,
	due_date,
	penalty
FROM 
	Customers 
	INNER JOIN 
	OverduePayments 
	ON Customers.customer_id = OverduePayments.customer_id
WHERE 
	penalty > 0;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, due_date, penalty, paid FROM OverduePayments;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM Customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, due_date FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT Customers.name, Customers.email, Payments.amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Payments ON Customers.id = Payments.customer_id;
SELECT id, due_date, COALESCE(penalty, 0) AS penalty_amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_due_amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE paid = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments;
SELECT id, customer_name, amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty > 100;
SELECT customer_name, due_date, amount FROM OverduePayments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE amount >= 500 AND penalty <= 50 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT Customers.name, Payments.amount FROM Customers JOIN Payments ON Customers.id = Payments.customer_id WHERE Payments.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, due_date, amount FROM OverduePayments WHERE amount >= 500 AND penalty < 50 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT p.id, p.amount, pen.amount AS penalty_amount FROM Payments p JOIN Penalties pen ON p.customer_id = pen.customer_id WHERE p.amount > pen.amount ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, amount_due FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, customer_name, amount_due, due_date FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty > 20.00;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE amount_due < 1000.00 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, due_date, penalty FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty <> 0 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, due_date ASC;
SELECT id, customer_name, amount_due, due_date, penalty FROM OverduePayments;
SELECT customer_name, due_date, penalty, amount_due, id FROM OverduePayments WHERE amount_due > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OverduePayments WHERE penalty > 50 ORDER BY amount_due ASC, due_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, amount_due * 1.1 AS total_due, due_date FROM OverduePayments WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01' AND penalty = 0 ORDER BY total_due DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount_due) AS total_amount_due FROM OverduePayments GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(amount_due) > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_due DESC;
